pre_text_caption_evidence: and subsidiaries notes to consolidated financial statements lending commitments the firm 2019s lending commitments are agreements to lend with fixed termination dates and depend on the satisfaction of all contractual conditions to borrowing .
these commitments are presented net of amounts syndicated to third parties .
the total commitment amount does not necessarily reflect actual future cash flows because the firm may syndicate all or substantial additional portions of these commitments .
in addition , commitments can expire unused or be reduced or cancelled at the counterparty 2019s request .
the table below presents information about lending commitments. .
original_metadata.question: what is the growth rate in the balance of lending commitments held for investment in 2018?
